parameters.description: Log intrinsic growth rate of COTS (year^-1), estimated from literature.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Population expansion potential of Crown-of-Thorns starfish reproduction

parameters.description: Log decline rate of COTS (year^-1), based on expert opinion.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Natural mortality and population reduction mechanisms for starfish

parameters.description: Log threshold for triggering COTS outbreak (individuals/m2), initial estimate.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Critical population density triggering massive coral predation outbreak

parameters.description: Efficiency of COTS predation on fast-growing corals (fraction, unitless).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Consumption rate impact on rapidly growing branching coral species

parameters.description: Efficiency of COTS predation on slow-growing corals (fraction, unitless).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Consumption rate impact on massive, slow-growing massive coral species

parameters.description: Log of the observation noise standard deviation for likelihood calculations.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Statistical uncertainty and measurement variability in ecological observations

parameters.description: Half-saturation constant for coral resource limitation on COTS growth (percentage cover).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Coral cover value where resource limitation reduces COTS growth rate by half

parameters.description: Steepness parameter in the logistic outbreak function, modulating the sensitivity of outbreak triggering to COTS abundance.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Controls the abruptness of outbreak activation based on COTS density and underlying ecological modifiers

parameters.description: Log environmental effect on COTS growth, representing environmental conditions that amplify or suppress outbreak initiation.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Modulates the intrinsic growth rate of COTS based on external environmental conditions

parameters.description: Half-saturation constant for predation efficiency on fast-growing corals, capturing non-linear predation functional response.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Represents the fast-growing coral cover at which predation efficiency is half-maximal due to refuge effects.

parameters.description: Half-saturation constant for predation efficiency on slow-growing corals, capturing non-linear predation functional response.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Represents the slow-growing coral cover at which predation efficiency is half-maximal due to refuge effects.

parameters.description: Exponent modulating the non-linear amplification of predation efficiency with increasing COTS abundance. This allows for enhanced impact on coral during outbreak peaks.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Exponent for the non-linear response in predation efficiency capturing a density-dependent increase in coral predation during COTS outbreaks
